price: Intumwa y’Imana Nuhu (nyakugira amahoro y’Imana Allah), yavuze iti: “Mana yanje Rurema Allah! Mu vy’ukuri, abantu banje barimonogoje mu kungarariza, baraheza bakurikira abantu ata co amatungo yabo n’abana babo bizobungura, atari uguhuba kw’isi no guhomba mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa.
arabic: قَالَ نُوحٞ رَّبِّ إِنَّهُمۡ عَصَوۡنِي وَٱتَّبَعُواْ مَن لَّمۡ يَزِدۡهُ مَالُهُۥ وَوَلَدُهُۥٓ إِلَّا خَسَارٗا

meta.transliteration: qāla nūḥun rabbi innahum ʿaṣawnī wa-ittabaʿū man lam yazid'hu māluhu wawaladuhu illā khasāran
